name: Pull-ups
description: An upper body exercise where you pull yourself up using a bar until your chin is above the bar.

name: Squats
description: A lower body exercise that targets the legs by lowering your hips and standing back up.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Exercise performed lying on your back and lifting hips off the ground to engage glutes.

name: Bicep Curls
description: Weight training exercise where you curl a dumbbell to strengthen the biceps.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Bodyweight exercise performed on parallel bars or a bench to target triceps.

name: Push-ups
description: A bodyweight exercise performed face down, raising and lowering the body using arms.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An exercise where weights are pressed overhead to strengthen shoulders.

name: Wrist Curls
description: An isolation exercise to strengthen the forearm muscles by curling the wrist.

name: Yoga Stretch
description: Flexibility exercise that involves stretching poses to improve mobility.

name: Jump Rope
description: Cardio exercise performed by jumping continuously over a rope.
